net.jhoogland.jautomata

Class ExplicitAutomaton<L,K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jhoogland.jautomata.AbstractAutomaton<L,K>
      • net.jhoogland.jautomata.ExplicitAutomaton<L,K>
  • Type Parameters:
    L - label type
    K - weight type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Automaton<L,K>, ReverselyAccessibleAutomaton<L,K>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayAutomaton, HashAutomaton

    public abstract class ExplicitAutomaton<L,K>
extends AbstractAutomaton<L,K>
implements ReverselyAccessibleAutomaton<L,K>
    Subclasses of this abstract class implement automaton types that explicitly store information of states (initial weight, final weight, incoming/outgoing transitions) and transitions (previous/next state, label, weight).
    Author:
    Jasper Hoogland
